Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='Y00')

BibliographicData.Title: Connections between the medial temporal cortex and the CA1 subfield of the hippocampal formation in the Japanese monkey (Macaca fuscata)

BrainSite.FullName: lateral part of cortical area TF
medial part of cortical area TF

Reference.Quotation: "M-12 and M-13 were injected with WGA-HRP, whereas M-14 and M-15 were injected with FB or DY (Fig. 1B). The injections were centered on the posterior half of area TEav in M-14 and the anterior half of area TEav in M-15 (figs. 1B, 4E). One other monkey (M-16) was injected with WGA-HRP into area TEpv, just lateral to the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4F)." (p. 290)

"In M-3 and M-4, the sites of WGA-HRP were centered on area TF2 and did not extend into the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4B, 7E). The injection site extended more rostrally in M-4 than in M-3 (Fig. 1B). In M-5 and M-6, the sites of FB injections were restricted to the caudal part of area TF2 (Fig. 1B)." (p. 287)

"In M-3 and M-4, the sites of WGA-HRP were centered on area TF2 and did not extend into the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4B, 7E). The injection site extended more rostrally in M-4 than in M-3 (Fig. 1B). In M-5 and M-6, the sites of FB injections were restricted to the caudal part of area TF2 (Fig. 1B)." (p. 287)

"WGA-HRP or FB was injected into area TH in two monkeys (M-7, M-8). The site of WGA-HRP injection in M-7 occupied the middle to caudal portions of both area TH and the parasubiculum, extending into the underlying white matter. The FB injection site in M-8 was confined to the TH region near area TF2 (Fig. 4C)." (p. 287)

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin

Reference.Quotation: "In three monkeys, WGA-HRP was injected into the caudal half of the perirhinal cortex. Both areas 35 and area 36 were involved in the injection sites in M-9 and M-10; injection site was localized within area 36 in M-11 (Figs. 1B, 4D, 9A)." (p. 287)

"In three monkeys, WGA-HRP was injected into the caudal half of the perirhinal cortex. Both areas 35 and area 36 were involved in the injection sites in M-9 and M-10; injection site was localized within area 36 in M-11 (Figs. 1B, 4D, 9A)." (p. 287)

"M-12 and M-13 were injected with WGA-HRP, whereas M-14 and M-15 were injected with FB or DY (Fig. 1B). The injections were centered on the posterior half of area TEav in M-14 and the anterior half of area TEav in M-15 (figs. 1B, 4E). One other monkey (M-16) was injected with WGA-HRP into area TEpv, just lateral to the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4F)." (p. 290)

"M-12 and M-13 were injected with WGA-HRP, whereas M-14 and M-15 were injected with FB or DY (Fig. 1B). The injections were centered on the posterior half of area TEav in M-14 and the anterior half of area TEav in M-15 (figs. 1B, 4E). One other monkey (M-16) was injected with WGA-HRP into area TEpv, just lateral to the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4F)." (p. 290)

"M-12 and M-13 were injected with WGA-HRP, whereas M-14 and M-15 were injected with FB or DY (Fig. 1B). The injections were centered on the posterior half of area TEav in M-14 and the anterior half of area TEav in M-15 (figs. 1B, 4E). One other monkey (M-16) was injected with WGA-HRP into area TEpv, just lateral to the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4F)." (p. 290)

"In two monkeys (M-1 and M-2), WGA-HRP was injected within area TF1 (Figs. 1b, 4A, 7A). In M-1, the injection site was centered on the deep portion of the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 4A, 7A). In M-2, the injection site was located in the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus, although some reaction products were seen in the superficial layers of the lateral bank of the sulcus (Fig. 1B)." (p. 287)

Reference.Comments: Althouhg the text says that lebeled neurons were only found in CA1, figure 7B shows labeled neurons in area ProS.

Reference.Quotation: "In two monkeys (M-1 and M-2), WGA-HRP was injected within area TF1 (Figs. 1b, 4A, 7A). In M-1, the injection site was centered on the deep portion of the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 4A, 7A). In M-2, the injection site was located in the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus, although some reaction products were seen in the superficial layers of the lateral bank of the sulcus (Fig. 1B)." (p. 287)

"In M-3 and M-4, the sites of WGA-HRP were centered on area TF2 and did not extend into the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4B, 7E). The injection site extended more rostrally in M-4 than in M-3 (Fig. 1B). In M-5 and M-6, the sites of FB injections were restricted to the caudal part of area TF2 (Fig. 1B)." (p. 287)

"In M-3 and M-4, the sites of WGA-HRP were centered on area TF2 and did not extend into the medial bank of the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4B, 7E). The injection site extended more rostrally in M-4 than in M-3 (Fig. 1B). In M-5 and M-6, the sites of FB injections were restricted to the caudal part of area TF2 (Fig. 1B)." (p. 287)

"WGA-HRP or FB was injected into area TH in two monkeys (M-7, M-8). The site of WGA-HRP injection in M-7 occupied the middle to caudal portions of both area TH and the parasubiculum, extending into the underlying white matter. The FB injection site in M-8 was confined to the TH region near area TF2 (Fig. 4C)." (p. 287)

"In three monkeys, WGA-HRP was injected into the caudal half of the perirhinal cortex. Both areas 35 and area 36 were involved in the injection sites in M-9 and M-10; injection site was localized within area 36 in M-11 (Figs. 1B, 4D, 9A)." (p. 287)

"M-12 and M-13 were injected with WGA-HRP, whereas M-14 and M-15 were injected with FB or DY (Fig. 1B). The injections were centered on the posterior half of area TEav in M-14 and the anterior half of area TEav in M-15 (figs. 1B, 4E). One other monkey (M-16) was injected with WGA-HRP into area TEpv, just lateral to the occipitotemporal sulcus (Figs. 1B, 4F)." (p. 290)
